title: Morning Joe 6/16/21
description: President Joe Biden will sit down for the first time since taking office with Russian President Vladimir Putin here on Wednesday in what’s expected to be an hours-long, contentious meeting.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
